"My name is Dr. Auriel but you can call me Dr. A for short to prevent all these
"Long story cut short, I am a possible future version of you..."
"Cool!! I'm a Doctor in the future!"

"I was testing on my time machine a few minutes ago. I finally had the calculations

"I believe when man travels through time, the concept of time compression
"It is when all time and space condense into a single point or moment or in this

"Ofcourse it is all theory and truth is yet to be discovered."
"Like any physics, this theory comes with a law..."
"Only one matter is allowed to exist between dimensions. No two of the same body
"Technically speaking, I am not allowed to exist in this timeline."
"I still can't fathom how on earth you manage to open up a rift!"
"Your prototype did not fail, it was not strong enough to stabilize the rift."
"So that means I can get another shot at trying to travel back to the past!"
"The matter that is used to fuel this machine is limited in this timeline."

"Which is why I travelled to this timeline, I want to build a replica of my machine."
"I can provide you knowledge in creating this time machine while you aid me in my
"We only have one shot at travelling between timelines..."
